subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: As reporters — and some teammates — railed against the referee who called a foul and waved off the goal of Maurice Edu, the U.S. player took a different approach.
snippet: As reporters — and some teammates — railed against the referee who called a foul and waved off the goal of Maurice Edu, the U.S. player took a different approach.
